title: MAC sound bug still active
body: So i took a couple of days off from league and thought that one of the numerous hot fixes would have fixed this. Is anyone else with a mac still having the bug where during team fights the sound goes wonky and the  fps goes to hell?

replies.body:
Hey Aranatar - 

We are aware of this issue and are investigating!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HMBccs8f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-30T16:58:29.270+0000)
>
> Hey Aranatar - 
> 
> We are aware of this issue and are investigating!

Thanks for the response. Good to know its getting looked at.
I'm still having this issue. Still hasn't been fixed yet...
